Class ApplicantController

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.controller.ApplicantController
All Implemented Interfaces:
canApplyFlat
public class ApplicantController extends Object implements canApplyFlat
Controller class to handle BTO project applications for applicants.

Provides functionality for applicants to apply for projects, view their application status, withdraw applications

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    ApplicantController(HDBApplicant model)
    Constructs an ApplicantController for the given applicant.

  • Method Details

    • withdrawApplication

      public void withdrawApplication()
      Requests to withdraw the applicant's current BTO application.

    • selectProject

      public BTOProj selectProject(List<BTOProj> availableProjects)
      Displays a list of available projects and allows the applicant to select a project.
      Parameters:
      availableProjects - the list of eligible BTO projects
      Returns:
      the selected project, or null if the applicant cancels the selection

    • getEligibleProjs

      public List<BTOProj> getEligibleProjs()
      Retrieves a list of BTO projects for which the applicant is eligible.
      Returns:
      a list of eligible BTO projects

    • checkEligibility

      public boolean checkEligibility(BTOProj project)
      Checks if the given project is eligible for the applicant based on their age and marital status.
      Specified by:
      checkEligibility in interface canApplyFlat
      Parameters:
      project - the project to check
      Returns:
      true if the applicant is eligible for the project, false otherwise

    • applyForProject

      public void applyForProject()
      Initiates the process for the applicant to apply for a BTO project. Prompts the applicant to select from eligible projects.

    • submitApplication

      public boolean submitApplication(BTOProj selectedProject)
      Submits an application for the selected BTO project on behalf of the applicant.
      Specified by:
      submitApplication in interface canApplyFlat
      Parameters:
      selectedProject - the project the applicant wishes to apply for
      Returns:
      true if the application was successfully submitted, false otherwise

    • showApplicantApplicationDetails

      public void showApplicantApplicationDetails()
      Displays the details of the applicant's current BTO application.
